com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface ImplicitDepsInferringDescription<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenruleDescription, AndroidReactNativeLibraryDescription, ApkGenruleDescription, AppleBundleDescription, ApplePackageDescription, AppleTestDescription, CxxBinaryDescription, CxxLibraryDescription, CxxPythonExtensionDescription, CxxTestDescription, GenruleDescription, HalideLibraryDescription, IosReactNativeLibraryDescription, PythonBinaryDescription, PythonTestDescription, ScalaLibraryDescription, ScalaTestDescription, ThriftLibraryDescription

    public interface ImplicitDepsInferringDescription<T>
    While building up the target graph, we infer the implicit dependencies of a rule by parsing all parameters with types SourcePath or BuildRule. However, in some cases like GenruleDescription, the AbstractGenruleDescription.Arg.cmd argument contains build targets in a specific format. Any Description that implements this interface can modify its implicit deps by poking at the raw build rule params.
